entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
